page.title: 12TOURISM IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: Paxford area is often used as a base for touring and walking holidays in the Cotswolds. The nearest railway station and coach services are at Moreton-in-Marsh. Bed & breakfast is provided at Charingworth Manor,the Three Oaks public house,Ebrington and Pudlicott Mill.Stapenhill Farm,Paxford and Pudlicott Mill offer touring caravan sites. There are several holiday cottages. Snacks and meals are available at the Three Oaks and the Churchill Inn, Paxford. Small parties are catered for by prior arrangement at Charingworth Manor. There is a Studio & Art Gallery & trout fishing at Pudlicott Mill. Ebrington Church has a Norman arch and other interesting monuments,including ones to Sir John Fortescue and William Keyte who bequeathed the Cow Charity.
